options.option1: Pursuant to IDW PS 981 (4) and pursuant to AT 4.2 (2)  MaRisk Management has to define a risk strategy that is consistent with the Business Strategy and the risks resulting therefrom.
options.option2: Pursuant to AT 4.3 MaRisk a risk management system should be implemented consisting of policies and procedures, risk culture and risk monitoring functions depending on the riskiness of the business transacted.
